correctness.rationale: Multiple key fields are not traceable to the article or are factually incorrect, despite some core items being correct (PEALD, temperature 200 °C, pressure ~1.2 Torr, plasma power 100 W, precursors DADI/TMGa/DEZ, O2 plasma, supercycle ratio In:Ga:Zn = 12:1:1, device metrics). Major issues: (1) growthPerCycle set to 11.86 Å for each sub-oxide (InOx/GaOx/ZnO) is incorrect—the paper states ~11.86 Å per supercycle, not per subcycle; numberofCycles = 12 is a misinterpretation (12 is In subcycles per supercycle, not total cycles), and total cycles/supercycles to reach 10 nm are not reported. (2) DosingTime and PurgeTime (all 1000 ms) are not provided in the article; these should be removed or left unspecified. (3) FlowRates: 200 sccm was the total Ar/O2 plasma reactant flow; precursor flows and purge gas flow rates are not reported—setting 200 sccm for precursorFlow and purgingGasFlow per compound is incorrect. (4) CarrierGas listed as “Ar/O2 mixed gas” is wrong; the mixture is the plasma co-reactant, while Ar is used as purge (and likely carrier); carrierGas should be Ar. (5) Material properties largely fabricated: refractiveIndex (1.8), absorptionCoefficient (0.01), bandGap (3.2 eV for IGZO), resistivity (0.00012 Ω·m), carrierDensity (1.5e19 C/m³), mobility in materialProperties, uniformity (5%), conformality aspect ratio (10), roughness (0.5 nm, AFM), filmDensity (5.2 g/dm³, unit inappropriate) are not reported. (6) FilmComposition.elementalConcentration set to 12% and method “XPS depth profile” are incorrect; the paper reports design ratio 12:1:1 and cation ratio stability via XRF, not an absolute 12% value; atomicRatio method should be XRF/design, not XPS depth profile. (7) Crystallinity method “TEM and XRD” is inaccurate; the study used TEM/FFT and GIWAXS, not XRD. (8) DeviceStructure should be “top-gate bottom-contact,” not just “top-gate transistor.” (9) OtherAspects (filmStability, reproducibility) are asserted without support. To correct: revise growthPerCycle to reflect per-supercycle value or adjust representation, remove unsupported dosing/purge/flow values, set carrierGas to Ar, update film composition method to XRF and drop unsupported concentration, replace crystallinity method with TEM/GIWAXS, specify deviceStructure as top-gate bottom-contact, and restrict material properties to only values reported in the paper.

completeness.rationale: Core PEALD facts are captured (PEALD method, DADI/TMGa/DEZ precursors, O2 plasma co‑reactant, Ar/O2 gas, 200 °C, 100 W, 1.2 Torr, Si/SiO2 substrate, supercycle ratio 12:1:1 and sequence InOx→GaOx→ZnO, device metrics μFE≈245 cm2/Vs, Vth≈0.17 V, SS≈74 mV/dec, ION/IOFF≈1.43×10^9, film thickness 10 nm). However, many parameters are missing, incorrect, or not traceable to the article, and an additional ALD process is omitted: 1) Missing second ALD process: the Al2O3 gate insulator deposited by PEALD at 200 °C with TMA and the same O2 plasma is not represented as a separate process (Device Fabrication section). 2) Growth-per-cycle is misinterpreted: 11.86 Å is reported per supercycle, not per subcycle/compound; assigning 11.86 Å to InOx, GaOx, and ZnO individually is incorrect (Fig. 1c,e; text states 11.86 Å per super-cycle). 3) Total number of cycles is wrong/untraceable: ‘12’ was the In sub‑cycles within one supercycle (In:Ga:Zn = 12:1:1), not the total cycles used to reach 10 nm; the article does not report total supercycles. 4) Dosing/purge times are fabricated (all 1000 ms); no such times are given. 5) Flow rates are misapplied: article only states mixed Ar/O2 reactant flow of 200 sccm (not per precursor); assigning 200 sccm to precursor and purge flows per compound is ungrounded. 6) Multiple material properties are invented: refractive index, absorption coefficient, resistivity, carrier density, roughness, density, uniformity variation, conformality aspect ratio—all not reported. 7) Film composition attribution is off: ‘12:1:1’ is a design ratio, not an XPS-derived atomic ratio; only stability of cation composition is discussed (XRF), without numeric values. 8) Crystallinity characterization method is inaccurate (‘TEM and XRD’); XRD is not reported—GIWAXS and TEM/FFT are used, and the film is an amorphous matrix with ordered layering. 9) ‘OtherAspects’ (safety, stability, reproducibility) are speculative and not stated. 10) Device structure is incomplete (“top-gate transistor”)—the article specifies top-gate bottom-contact. 11) Reactor manufacturer set to “not specified” is not traceable. To improve completeness, add a separate Al2O3 PEALD process, correct GPC to per supercycle (or omit per-compound GPC if unavailable), remove unreported dosing/purge times and precursor flows, omit or source film properties (RI, roughness, density, uniformity, conformality), provide accurate crystallinity method (TEM/GIWAXS), and avoid speculative fields (safety/reproducibility).
